Well, his has his work cut out for him.  He did a very job on the first one and really should have done the entire trilogy, but the second one train-wrecked the franchise at this point. While TFA was a rehash of ANH, it at least set up a lot of interesting new subplots to explore in the new trilogy. Thanks Rian Johnson, for subverting all of our expectations of having of having a good movie. You truly deserve an entire trilogy for yourself after the wonderful work you've done...
